amendment.description: An amendment numbered 82 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to prohibit funds for the cancellation or suspension of oil and gas leases in the ANWR or the NPR-A.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Clyde amendment (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Clyde amendment (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Clyde amendment (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.
